Reviews.Title: Batteries are great, the charger I received didn't work.
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The batteries are great, they work well and have a higher amp-hour rating than the OEM, which is great for my power hungry digital camera.  The reason that I did not rate this higher is that the charger doesn't work.  I mean it's DOA, completely inoperative.  I'm sure it's just a defective unit that I was unlucky enough to get.  I have not bothered to return it because the cost of shipping it back far exceeds the price of the part, but for the inconvenience and added cost for me to replace it, I am dropping the star rating on this package.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: stanley g finch
Reviews.Content: I got a Panasonic ts5 camera for vacation to Hawaii but assumed I could easily get extra batteries locally.  I was wrong and scrambled to order some extras online and found this nicely priced kit, especially when compared to namebrand Panasonic extras.This includes 2 batteries and the charger either plugs into a typical wall socket or 12 volt port on your car, which the name brand Panasonic charger that came with my camera did NOT feature.So everything works and the price was less total than a single replacement battery from Panasonic!Also seller delivered quick and I got the package a day ahead of estimated delivery date in Hawaii while on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: novastorm "novastorm"
Reviews.Content: These batteries seem to work the same as OEM and for the money, the batteries and charger are a great deal. Highly recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1250 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BCM13 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1250 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS5 and Lumix DMC-ZS30 Digital Cameras and Panasonic DMW-BCM13
